name: Mul Gwishin
shortLoreBlurb: Mul Gwishin is a spirit from Korea linked to water ghosts, drowning. Offerings seek calm waters and life-giving rains. They mediate funerary rites and karmic reckonings.
overlapsLinks: Anubis (Egyptian), Hel (Norse), Naga (India/SE Asia), Poseidon (Greek), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Yama (Buddhist), Yemaya (Yoruba)
description: Mul Gwishin is a spirit from Korea linked to water ghosts, drowning. Offerings seek calm waters and life-giving rains. They mediate funerary rites and karmic reckonings.
